sn35.116:4.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ, daṭṭheyyaṃ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
sn35.116:4.2: Na ca panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmī”ti.
sn35.116:4.3: Idaṃ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
sn35.116:4.4: Atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
sn35.116:4.5: “idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
sn35.116:4.6: ‘“nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ, daṭṭheyyaṃ, patteyyan”ti vadāmi.
sn35.116:4.7: Na ca panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmī’ti.
sn35.116:4.8: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā”ti?
sn35.116:5.2: “ayaṃ kho āyasmā ānando satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
sn35.116:5.3: Pahoti cāyasmā ānando imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
sn35.116:6.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn35.116:6.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
sn35.116:6.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn35.116:7.1: “Idaṃ kho no, āvuso ānanda, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
sn35.116:7.2: ‘nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ, daṭṭheyyaṃ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
sn35.116:7.3: Na ca panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmī’ti.
sn35.116:7.4: Tesaṃ no, āvuso, amhākaṃ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
sn35.116:7.5: ‘idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho—
sn35.116:7.6: nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ, daṭṭheyyaṃ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
sn35.116:7.7: Na ca panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmīti.
sn35.116:7.8: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā’ti?
sn35.116:7.10: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, āyasmā ānando satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
sn35.116:7.11: Pahoti cāyasmā ānando imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
sn35.116:8.1: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva, mūlaṃ atikkammeva, khandhaṃ sākhāpalāse sāraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ maññeyya;
sn35.116:8.2: evaṃ sampadamidaṃ āyasmantānaṃ satthari sammukhībhūte taṃ bhagavantaṃ atisitvā amhe etamatthaṃ paṭipucchitabbaṃ maññatha.
sn35.116:8.3: So hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati—
sn35.116:8.4: cakkhubhūto, ñāṇabhūto, dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto, vattā, pavattā, atthassa ninnetā, amatassa dātā, dhammassāmī, tathāgato.
sn35.116:8.5: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha.
sn35.116:8.6: Yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya tathā vo dhāreyyāthā”ti.
sn35.116:9.1: “Addhāvuso ānanda, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati—
sn35.116:9.2: cakkhubhūto, ñāṇabhūto, dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto, vattā, pavattā, atthassa ninnetā, amatassa dātā, dhammassāmī, tathāgato.
sn35.116:9.3: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyāma.
sn35.116:9.4: Yathā no bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṃ dhāreyyāma.
sn35.116:9.5: Api cāyasmā ānando satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
sn35.116:9.6: Pahoti cāyasmā ānando imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
sn35.116:10.2: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṃ.
sn35.116:11.1: “Yaṃ kho vo, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
sn35.116:11.2: ‘nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ, daṭṭheyyaṃ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
sn35.116:11.3: Na ca panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmī’ti, imassa khvāhaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
sn35.116:11.4: Yena kho, āvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī hoti lokamānī—
sn35.116:11.6: Kena cāvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī hoti lokamānī?
sn35.116:11.7: Cakkhunā kho, āvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī hoti lokamānī.
sn35.116:11.10: jivhāya kho, āvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī hoti lokamānī.
sn35.116:11.12: manena kho, āvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī hoti lokamānī.
sn35.116:11.13: Yena kho, āvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī hoti lokamānī—
sn35.116:11.15: Yaṃ kho vo, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
sn35.116:11.16: ‘nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ, daṭṭheyyaṃ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
sn35.116:11.17: Na ca panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmī’ti, imassa khvāhaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
sn35.116:11.18: Ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha.
sn35.116:11.19: Yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
sn35.116:12.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn35.116:12.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn35.116:13.1: “Yaṃ kho no, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
sn35.116:13.2: ‘nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ, daṭṭheyyaṃ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
sn35.116:13.3: Na ca panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmī’ti.
sn35.116:13.4: Tesaṃ no, bhante, amhākaṃ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
sn35.116:13.5: ‘idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho—
sn35.116:13.6: nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ, daṭṭheyyaṃ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
sn35.116:13.7: Na ca panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmīti.
sn35.116:13.8: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā’ti?
sn35.116:13.10: ‘ayaṃ kho āyasmā ānando satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
sn35.116:13.11: Pahoti cāyasmā ānando imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
sn35.116:13.14: Atha kho mayaṃ, bhante, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamimha;
sn35.116:13.16: Tesaṃ no, bhante, āyasmatā ānandena imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi attho vibhatto”ti.
sn35.116:14.3: Mañcepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi taṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyaṃ yathā taṃ ānandena byākataṃ.
sn35.116:14.4: Eso cevetassa attho, evañca naṃ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
